film directed, produced, and co-written by Baz Luhrmann. It tells the story of a 
young Scottish poet/writer, Christian (Ewan McGregor), who falls in love with the 
star of the Moulin Rouge, cabaret actress and courtesan Satine (Nicole Kidman).
